title: Old pornographic video viral as Shaheen Bagh
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
A video of a couple having sexual intercourse behind an alleyway is circulating on social media as an incident from Shaheen Bagh. From the Twitter account @Baburao71275507, the video has garnered close to 1,500 retweets and over 1 lakh views.

The clip has been shared with a derogatory message – “भैंस की👁️ ये क्या हो रिया है”🤔 जैसे जैस दिन बीत रहा है शाहीन बाग की सच्चाई सामने आने लगी है शाहिन बाग मे अब हिलती कारे नही सुजते%$#@()दिख रहे है मुल्ली के😍सोचने वाली बात ये है इतनी महगांई में ऊच्चकोटी का सामान 500 में कैसे ये तो लोकतंत्र के खिलाफ है तांडव करना होगा रे बाबा”‘!😛”

A Twitter handle @Indian91783856 quote-tweeted the above video and wrote, “Young children aged below 18 shouldn’t watch this video from Shaheen Bagh. See the scared community behind Shaheen Bagh, right after coming out of Madrasa.”

The video has also been shared on Facebook. Below is a post by Facebook page ‘Hindu Sher Hu Main’.

A reverse-image search of one of the keyframes from the clip reveals that a pornographic video is being used to discredit Shaheen Bagh and the women protesting against the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA). The same video was found on an Arabic website anotepad.com, uploaded on 10 July 2018. The protests in Shaheen Bagh have been ongoing since December 2019.

In fact, the clip was found on several porn websites or social media handles.

An old pornographic video is therefore viral on social media to target Muslim women protesting against the CAA in Shaheen Bagh.
